title: Fourier Neural Operator for Parametric PDEs

series_info.title: Understanding FNO from Scratch
series_info.description: A comprehensive, interactive tutorial on Fourier Neural Operators. We start from mathematical foundations and build up to a complete implementation, then apply it to a real-world urban climate prediction problem.

prerequisites: Fourier analysis basics (helpful but we cover it)
learning_outcomes: Understand the mathematical theory behind neural operators
Implement FNO from scratch in Python
Know when and why to use FNO vs other architectures
Apply FNO to real scientific problems
Evaluate and benchmark neural operator models properly

chunks.title: Introduction
chunks.subtitle: Overview of FNO and what you'll learn
chunks.description: Welcome to the FNO tutorial series. Learn what problem FNO solves, see the architecture overview, and understand the roadmap for this comprehensive tutorial.

chunks.title: Mathematical Foundations
chunks.subtitle: The mathematics you need before diving into FNO
chunks.description: Covers function spaces, operators, PDEs basics, and the mathematical framework for understanding neural operators.

chunks.title: Fourier Theory for Neural Networks
chunks.subtitle: How Fourier transforms enable efficient global operations
chunks.description: Deep dive into Fourier transforms, the convolution theorem, and why operating in frequency space is powerful.

chunks.title: Neural Operator Framework
chunks.subtitle: Learning mappings between function spaces
chunks.description: The general framework for neural operators - learning operators instead of functions.

chunks.title: FNO Architecture
chunks.subtitle: Building the Fourier Neural Operator layer by layer
chunks.description: Complete implementation of FNO - lifting, Fourier layers, and projection. The core of the tutorial.

chunks.title: Training Methodology
chunks.subtitle: How to train neural operators effectively
chunks.description: Loss functions, optimizers, data generation, and training strategies specific to neural operators.

chunks.title: Applications and Benchmarks
chunks.subtitle: FNO on standard PDE benchmarks
chunks.description: Apply FNO to Burgers equation, Darcy flow, and Navier-Stokes. Compare with baselines.

chunks.title: Urban Climate Case Study
chunks.subtitle: Applying FNO to real-world climate prediction
chunks.description: A comprehensive case study applying everything we learned to predict urban land surface temperature. This is the capstone project.
